title: New: Conditioner – Dates & Names
body:
Was very into the first couple of tracks released by LA’s Conditioner a year or so back – perfectly succinct songwriting, part Vampire Weekend, part The Shins.

Twelve months on and they’ve followed up _Introducing _with _Dates & Names, _another Ezra Koenig-esque number that again demonstrates their knack for penning delicious melodies. Check it out below.

excerpt.full: Was very into the first couple of tracks released by LA’s Conditioner a year or so back – perfectly succinct songwriting, part Vampire Weekend, part The Shins. Twelve months on and they’ve followed up Introducing with Dates & Names, another Ezra Koenig-esque number that again demonstrates their knack for penning delicious melodies. Check it out below.
